noanumanayak na ethanath bukiya gananam katha thiyeyi hungak….ayi me siyaluma dena melesin hasirenne….eyata pradhanathama hethuwa owun , owunge sitha…thaniwimata aැthi baya nisayi….thanikama yanu etharamma darunu deyak…minisun etharam eyata biya ee nisa wiya yuthuyi….namuth thanikama kiyanne …ada eeye aathiwuna deyak nemene….athithaye minisuntath ewani de danuna…wenasa wenne ewita ee minisun thanikama nathikaragath ..ehemath nathnam ee thani kamata muhuna dun widiyayi….ee minisunta mewan diyunu thakshanaya thibunna ….eyala eyalage thanikama nathikaragaththe pothapath saha swabhawadharmaya magin…..ithin aththatama kiyanawa nam owunge manasa …ada samajaye wesena minisunge manasata wada danumin sannaddayi….ithin owun ha apa sansandanaya kalahoth owun sitinathanata apita lan wennawath ba ….

aadi sinhalayange warikarmanthaye athidaksha buddhiyath, gruha nirmanashilpiya nyanayath, wichithra kala kusalathawath mahiyangana pradeshaya purawihidi athi siddhasthana saha waw amunuwalin dakagannata puluwana.

adala siduwima sambandhayen widhimath ha sampurna parikshanayak pawathwimata janadhipathiwaraya wisin me wana witath polisiya athulu wagakiwa yuthu ansha wetha siyalu upades laba di athi bawin siddhiya pilibandawa paudgalika arthakathana ek kirima ha mathawada pathirawima nusudusu bawa pradhana amathyawaraya wadi duratath penwa dena ladi.
basil me siddhiya sidu wu aakaraya gana owungen wisthara wimasa sitiyeya.
inpasu pamini anith ayatath wisheshaye sehon ge ayithi yosaptath eya waradida?

namuth ee assata man dapu bayila nisa podi pahe wiwadayakuth athiwuna!
